title: Physical Damage Katarina???

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body: AD Katarina would give pretty good scaling on the E and R, but you'd be sacrificing damage on the Q and W. As has already been mentioned, Lethality (and Armour Pen) will only apply to basic attacks, since all of Kat's abilities deal Magic Damage. A better idea is an AP biased hybrid, which *should* work well with the Hextech Gunblade, which will also give you sustain from the passive (I have a large tendency to use Hextech Gunblade whenever I use Kat). Personally, I find Luden's Echo to be a good 2nd/3rd item.
don't buy lethality items on Katarina, they don't work on anything but her autoattacks. All your abilitys do magic damage so yes only magic penetration works on them.
Your abilities will still deal magic damage, it doesn't matter if they're scaling off ad or ap items, it's how the abilities are defined that determine the type of damage.
